mapper.update: update search_item set site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, base_uri = #{baseUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_item = #{bookItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_picture = #{bookPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_author = #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_intro = #{bookIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_update = #{bookUpdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_words = #{bookWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, site_id, base_uri, book_item, book_picture, book_name, book_author, book_intro, book_update, book_words, update_time, create_time from search_item where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, site_id, base_uri, book_item, book_picture, book_name, book_author, book_intro, book_update, book_words, update_time, create_time from search_item
